testcase.name: Successful_Completion_Of_Purchase_Order
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Successful completion of purchase order given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.954s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.06882s e when User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.232s when User adds item 'fleece jacket' to the cart ... passed in 1.214s when User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.236s when User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.219s when User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Doe', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.217s then User continue from checkout overview ... passed in 1.219s when User verifies total amount as well as finishes the order ... passed in 1.264s then User should see the order confirmation page with message Thank you for your order! ... passed in 0.006983s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
